description: Maximal numbers of codewords in mixed code with 3 binary coordinates and n ternary coordinates with Hamming distance 3.
links: P. R. J. Ostergard, Classification of small binary/ternary one-error-correcting codes (Appendix), Discrete Mathematics 223 (2000), 253-262.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 04 2000
